routes.documentation: External password authentication service for Issue #898
SMS authentication verification - returns 400 for wrong code, 200 for correct code (123456)

responses.label: Failure - wrong code

routes.documentation: Email authentication verification - returns 400 for wrong code, 200 for correct code

responses.label: Failure - wrong code

routes.documentation: E2E test: Identity verification with retry scenario

responses.label: First attempt - 503 Service Unavailable
Second attempt - 503 Service Unavailable

routes.documentation: E2E test: Error response patterns for identity verification API

responses.label: 400 Bad Request
401 Unauthorized

headers.value: Bearer error="invalid_token", error_description="The access token is invalid or expired"

routes.documentation: E2E test: OAuth 401 retry - always returns 401 to verify retry behavior in logs

responses.label: 401 Unauthorized - Always

headers.value: Bearer error="invalid_token", error_description="The access token is expired or revoked"

routes.documentation: E2E test: OAuth 403 retry - always returns 403 to verify retry behavior in logs

responses.label: 403 Forbidden - Always

routes.documentation: E2E test: User verification endpoint for SSRF protection test
CIBA client notification endpoint - RFC 8266 Section 10.2/10.3. Validates Authorization header contains Bearer token.

responses.label: Unauthorized - Missing/Invalid Authorization header
Success

headers.value: Content-Type, Origin, Accept, Authorization, Content-Length, X-Requested-With
